name: Light Doggo
description:
Light Doggo: Hadeshas stolen all the light from the world, but luckily your dead dog Spot has come to guide you through the underworld to Hades palace to steal back the light.

Controls are in the game more or less, this is a 2 player game, although it is playable as just 1 player, with partial controller support (the mouse may cause some funky stuff)
